#summary How to setup Groovy in your IDE

= Introduction =

In order to define TC experiments in groovy, some plugins have to be installed in eclipse.

= Eclipse with m2e =

  * Install the Groovy-Eclipse "configurator for m2eclipse" using any of [http://docs.codehaus.org/display/GROOVY/Groovy-Eclipse+compiler+plugin+for+Maven#Groovy-EclipsecompilerpluginforMaven-Groovy-Eclipseconfiguratorform2Eclipse these update sites]
  * Install the Groovy-Eclipse plujgin via the Eclipse marketplace or any of [http://groovy.codehaus.org/Eclipse+Plugin these update sites]
